heisigStory: Windy . . . drops of . . . insects. Hint: think of the last two primitives as representing a swarm of gnats, those tiny drops of pesky insects.
hint: The WIND usually carries things around in it - drops of rain or snow, and lots of insects.
koohiiStory1: They say that when an INSECT flaps its wings even the single DROP of WIND that it creates is sometimes enough to create a hurricane on the other side of the Earth.
koohiiStory2: The WIND usually carries things around in it - drops of rain or snow, and lots of insects.
myStory: cơn gió. một bọ chui hang khi có gió
readingExamples: 風力 (ふうりょく), 風俗 (ふうぞく), 強風 (きょうふう), 風 (かぜ)
